results.name: Uncommon Valor: Campaign for the South Pacific

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and later (64-bit and 32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 and Vulkan compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have performance issues, vsync may be the one caussing those problems
